seo.title: SITA-billetter og tips
seo.description: Hvor du kjøper SITA-billetter, regler for påstempling, bagasje- og køtips for bussene langs Amalfikysten.

intro: Buy SITA tickets before boarding and allow extra time in summer. Keep tickets until the end of your ride.

sections.title: Where to buy
body: Buy at tabacchi/kiosks along the main road. Stock up when lines are short.

sections.title: Validation
body: Validate on boarding where machines exist; keep tickets until exit.

a: Generally not; buy before boarding to avoid delays.
